docs.snippet: Pablo Sandoval is headed to Boston, bumping Hanley Ramirez to an already crowded outfield and opening an array of options for a team trying to rebuilding its starting rotation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pablo Sandoval is headed to Boston, bumping Hanley Ramirez to an already crowded outfield and opening an array of options for a team trying to rebuilding its starting rotation.
docs.abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes Boston Red Sox deals for third baseman Pablo Sandoval and Hanley Ramirez, set to play in outfield, open up array of options and possibilities, as team seeks to rebuild its starting rotation and take another run at a championship.

docs.snippet: On Monday, the Red Sox committed nearly $200 million to sign Pablo Sandoval and Hanley Ramirez in moves that resembled Yankees tactics of the past. But the Yankees barely flinched....
docs.lead_paragraph: On Monday, the Red Sox committed nearly $200 million to sign Pablo Sandoval and Hanley Ramirez in moves that resembled Yankees tactics of the past. But the Yankees barely flinched.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees' plan this off-season is to add specific and moderate pieces without spending nearly as lavishly as they did a year ago; do not react to Boston Red Sox' high-profile acquisitions of free agents Yankees had resolved to to go after.

headline.main: This Time, the Yankees Shrug as the Red Sox Spend
